rev.comment: /* De-emphasis on educational aspects */ Correct spelling of this doll line.
/* 2008: Mia St. Clair */ Wiki is not the place to update regarding AG stock on individual items.
[[User:Rjwilmsi#Other_fixes|gen fixes]]: (2) set identical unnamed references to use named refs (2), using [[Project:AutoWikiBrowser|AWB]]
[[WP:AWB/T|Typo fixing]] and/or cleanup, typos fixed: comapny → company using [[Project:AutoWikiBrowser|AWB]]
/* Nellie O'Malley, 1904 */ No documented evidence to support claim that dolls will be reintroduced, or dates; removed.
Removed repetitive and grammatically incorrect sentence.

[[WP:UNDO|Undid]] revision 249224334 by [[Special:Contributions/72.209.187.94|72.209.187.94]] ([[User talk:72.209.187.94|talk]]) My Twinn is the creative spelling of the brand, not a typo

/* Controversy */ rephrased to show this is opinion of one sub-group of collectors.
Subjective opinion not appropriate for Wiki; removed comment that Kailey is one of the prettiest dolls.
No verifiable source available for Chrissa info; deleted speculation.
/* 2009: Chrissa Maxwell */ No need to go into detail here as readers can follow the referenced footnote for more plot details.
/* Nellie O'Malley, 1904 */ Nellie retired along with Samantha Parkington doll
/* Samantha Parkington, 1904 */ Confirms and quotes Mattel that Samantha doll will be retired
Added additional online collector guide resources to External Links
Edited for typo which distorted original text.
Undo contributor speculation about potential GOTY names.

[[WP:AWB/T|Typo]]/[[Template:Citation|accessdate]]/[[MOS:SYL|date]] fixes, Replaced: July 2, 2008. → [[July 2]] [[2008]]. (9), typos fixed: responsiblities → responsibilities, seh → she using [[Proj
/* American Girl Movies */ Remove actors' previous work; it does NOT belong on this page. If people want to know about it, they can follow the link to the actor's individual Wikipedia article.
/* American Girl Movies */ the film isn't a best friend's movie, it's Kit's movie; also remove [[WP:OR|original research]]; past work should be on the actor's page, not here
